sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as UTC_TAG_COUNT FROM log.source_register_table
WHERE ETL_UTC_TAG > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
AND (ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS IS NOT NULL)
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status is not null
			   and etl_utc_tag > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTREC
  FROM [log].[Source_Register_Table]
  WHERE [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] = '@{item().name}'
  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME AS TARGET_BLOB_NAME 
FROM LOG.SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE 
WHERE ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'E'
AND DATEDIFF(DAY,INSERT_TIMESTAMP,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')) < 8

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTREC
  FROM [log].[Source_Register_Table]
  WHERE [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] = '@{item().name}'
  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS = 'FAILED'

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
